text.name: ui_settings_info
text.text: Real Time Sync Info

text.name: ui_settings_info_1
text.text: Welcome to Real Time Sync. This mod makes it possible to synchronize the game time with real life time at a set offset.

text.name: ui_settings_info_2
text.text: This system will synchronize to a UTC offset. Most servers use -5 for EU and -11 for US. This puts day time in game to be earlier in the day for when most players get off work and play the game.

text.name: ui_settings_info_3
text.text: It is not suggested to use this system with single player. If you do, you will have to turn it off to fast forward to the next day. This mod is not smart enough to know what the real life day is.

text.name: ui_rtsSettingsNoPermissionText
text.text: Only Admins can alter these settings.
